Comments: CC provides a single list of URLs to download files from, aria2c was used to download all files to a single folder.
This includes time to fix issues popping up and restart downloading.
experiments with wide17 have shown that it is beneficial to use much more threads than there are actual cpu cores, downloading doesn't utilize CPU significantly

Each task runs warc2text on 100 WARCs and creates a new folder for this task with one subfolder per detected language (about 120-160 in total) and 2 files (url.gz, text.gz) in each subfolder.
The number of fies with raw text

column1: uncompressed text size for 77 languages, TB
Comments: raw text size for 77 languages from the proposal after warc2text, for wide16 this large size reduction is due to filtering out examples classified as UNK (FastText langid for wide16, CLD2 for others)
Wall clock time of warc2texting, depends on the number of threads
The number of threads used for warc2texting
